computer.colors: built in 9 inch monochrome green monitor
computer.description:
The Kaypro 16 was the first Kaypro model to use MS-DOS and Intel 8088 CPU instead of the good old CP/M - Z80 couple. It was thus a machine that represents the new direction taken by Kaypro and the technological evolution in general.
The Kaypro 16/2 is a Kaypro 16 with two 5''1/4 floppy drives and no hard drive. Both versions shipped with a large bundle of software: MS-DOS, WordStar, MailMerge, CalcStar, InfoStar, MITE, GW-Basic, tutorials and... 13 manuals! _______________________
computer.keyboard: detachable 83-key IBM compatible keyboard, function keys and numeric keypad
computer.media: One 5''1/4 disk-drive (360k) + Second FDD or 10 MB hard-drive
computer.name: Kaypro 16
computer.ports: 1 IBM expansion slot, Parallel, Serial, external monitors (color and monochrome)
computer.ram: 256 KB (512 KB max. on the main board)
